greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Interleave n+1 and n-1.
comment: Pairwise sums are abs(A023443), or n-1+2*0^n. The partial sums of this sequence is A000124, with extra leading 1. Partial sums are A097066. Binomial transform is A097067.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) - a(n-3) for n > 2. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 10 2017
mathematica: Table[(2n - 1)/4 + 5(-1)^n/4, {n, 0, 75}] (* Or *) Flatten[ Table[{n + 1, n - 1}, {n, 0, 37}]] (* Or *) CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 2x + 2x^2)/((1 + x)(1 - x)^2), {x, 0, 75}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 24 2004 *)
program: a097065 n = n' - 2 * m where (n', m) = divMod (n + 2) 2
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 22 2004
